Protocol# MTLFXTemporalDenoisedScalerBase

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+

```
protocol MTLFXTemporalDenoisedScalerBase : MTLFXFrameInterpolatableScaler
```

## [Topics](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase#topics)

### [Instance Properties](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase#Instance-Properties)

[`var colorTexture: (any MTLTexture)?`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/colortexture)Assigns the color texture this scaler evaluates.**Required**

[`var colorTextureFormat: MTLPixelFormat`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/colortextureformat)The pixel format of the input color texture for this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var colorTextureUsage: MTLTextureUsage`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/colortextureusage)The minimal texture usage options that your app’s input color texture needs in order to support this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var denoiseStrengthMaskTexture: (any MTLTexture)?`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/denoisestrengthmasktexture)The denoise strength mask texture this scaler evaluates.**Required**

[`var denoiseStrengthMaskTextureFormat: MTLPixelFormat`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/denoisestrengthmasktextureformat)The pixel format of the input denoise strength mask texture for this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var denoiseStrengthMaskTextureUsage: MTLTextureUsage`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/denoisestrengthmasktextureusage)The minimal texture usage options that your app’s input denoise strength texture needs in order to support this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var depthTexture: (any MTLTexture)?`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/depthtexture)The depth texture this scaler evaluates.**Required**

[`var depthTextureFormat: MTLPixelFormat`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/depthtextureformat)The pixel format of the input depth texture for this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var depthTextureUsage: MTLTextureUsage`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/depthtextureusage)The minimal texture usage options that your app’s input depth texture needs in order to support this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var diffuseAlbedoTexture: (any MTLTexture)?`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/diffusealbedotexture)The diffuse albedo texture this scaler evaluates.**Required**

[`var diffuseAlbedoTextureFormat: MTLPixelFormat`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/diffusealbedotextureformat)The pixel format of the input diffuse albedo texture for this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var diffuseAlbedoTextureUsage: MTLTextureUsage`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/diffusealbedotextureusage)The minimal texture usage options that your app’s input diffuse albedo texture needs in order to support this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var exposureTexture: (any MTLTexture)?`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/exposuretexture)An exposure texture that this denoiser scaler evaluates.**Required**

[`var fence: (any MTLFence)?`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/fence)An optional fence that this denoiser scaler waits for and updates.**Required**

[`var inputContentMaxScale: Float`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/inputcontentmaxscale)The maximum input content scale this scaler supports.**Required**

[`var inputContentMinScale: Float`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/inputcontentminscale)The minimum input content scale this scaler supports.**Required**

[`var inputHeight: Int`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/inputheight)The height, in pixels, of the input color texture for the scaler.**Required**

[`var inputWidth: Int`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/inputwidth)The width, in pixels, of the input color texture for the scaler.**Required**

[`var isDepthReversed: Bool`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/isdepthreversed)A Boolean value that indicates whether the depth texture uses zero to represent the farthest distance.**Required**

[`var jitterOffsetX: Float`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/jitteroffsetx)The horizontal component of the subpixel sampling coordinate you use to generate the color texture input.**Required**

[`var jitterOffsetY: Float`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/jitteroffsety)The vertical component of the subpixel sampling coordinate you use to generate the color texture input.**Required**

[`var motionTexture: (any MTLTexture)?`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/motiontexture)The motion texture this scaler evaluates.**Required**

[`var motionTextureFormat: MTLPixelFormat`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/motiontextureformat)The pixel format of the input motion texture for this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var motionTextureUsage: MTLTextureUsage`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/motiontextureusage)The minimal texture usage options that your app’s input motion texture needs in order to support this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var motionVectorScaleX: Float`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/motionvectorscalex)The horizontal scale factor the denoiser scaler applies to the input motion texture.**Required**

[`var motionVectorScaleY: Float`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/motionvectorscaley)The vertical scale factor the denoiser scaler applies to the input motion texture.**Required**

[`var normalTexture: (any MTLTexture)?`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/normaltexture)The normal texture this scaler evaluates.**Required**

[`var normalTextureFormat: MTLPixelFormat`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/normaltextureformat)The pixel format of the input normal texture for this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var outputHeight: Int`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/outputheight)The height, in pixels, of the output color texture for the scaler.**Required**

[`var outputTexture: (any MTLTexture)?`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/outputtexture)The output texture into which this denoiser scaler writes its output.**Required**

[`var outputTextureFormat: MTLPixelFormat`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/outputtextureformat)The pixel format of the output color texture for this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var outputTextureUsage: MTLTextureUsage`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/outputtextureusage)The minimal texture usage options that your app’s output texture needs in order to support this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var outputWidth: Int`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/outputwidth)The width, in pixels, of the output color texture for the scaler.**Required**

[`var preExposure: Float`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/preexposure)A pre-exposure value for this scaler to evaluate.**Required**

[`var reactiveMaskTexture: (any MTLTexture)?`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/reactivemasktexture)A reactive-mask texture input for this scaler to evaluate.**Required**

[`var reactiveMaskTextureFormat: MTLPixelFormat`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/reactivemasktextureformat)The pixel format of the input reactive mask texture for this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var reactiveTextureUsage: MTLTextureUsage`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/reactivetextureusage)The minimal texture usage options that your app’s input reactive texture needs in order to support this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var roughnessTexture: (any MTLTexture)?`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/roughnesstexture)The roughness texture this scaler evaluates.**Required**

[`var roughnessTextureUsage: MTLTextureUsage`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/roughnesstextureusage)The minimal texture usage options that your app’s input roughness texture needs in order to support this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var shouldResetHistory: Bool`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/shouldresethistory)A Boolean property indicating whether to reset history.**Required**

[`var specularAlbedoTexture: (any MTLTexture)?`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/specularalbedotexture)The specular albedo texture this scaler evaluates.**Required**

[`var specularAlbedoTextureFormat: MTLPixelFormat`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/specularalbedotextureformat)The pixel format of the input specular albedo for this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var specularAlbedoTextureUsage: MTLTextureUsage`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/specularalbedotextureusage)The minimal texture usage options that your app’s input specular albedo texture needs in order to support this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var specularHitDistanceTexture: (any MTLTexture)?`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/specularhitdistancetexture)The specular hit texture this scaler evaluates.**Required**

[`var specularHitDistanceTextureFormat: MTLPixelFormat`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/specularhitdistancetextureformat)The pixel format of the input specular hit distance texture for this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var specularHitDistanceTextureUsage: MTLTextureUsage`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/specularhitdistancetextureusage)The minimal texture usage options that your app’s input specular hit texture needs in order to support this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var transparencyOverlayTexture: (any MTLTexture)?`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/transparencyoverlaytexture)The transparency overlay texture that this scaler evaluates.**Required**

[`var transparencyOverlayTextureFormat: MTLPixelFormat`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/transparencyoverlaytextureformat)The pixel format of the input transparency overlay texture for this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var transparencyOverlayTextureUsage: MTLTextureUsage`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/transparencyoverlaytextureusage)The minimal texture usage options that your app’s input transparency overlay texture needs in order to support this denoiser scaler.**Required**

[`var viewToClipMatrix: simd_float4x4`](/documentation/metalfx/mtlfxtemporaldenoisedscalerbase/viewtoclipmatrix)The view-to-clip coordinates transformation matrix this scaler uses as part of its operation.**Required**
